Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Convoy looked around as his fur stood on end. "Hold up kids i think theres 
trouble over these hills." He transformed and walked forward slowly until he 
could touch the sheild... Inside the sheild were the damaged dino-bots still in 
stasis from the ambush... he did not know who they were, but perhaps they were 
the ones who did this?"
**********

Scourge looked up surprised when his sensors started buzzing... "The ark... 
hmmm ahahahahahahaha Time to start." He began walking forward as his new 
programing began to work he chuckled as he cried out... "Scourge Transform and roll 
out." As he became the great large black 18-wheeler the trailor now had the 
design of his terracon faction a green autobot design... He signaled GrimLock 
and Quet to follow...

--part1_16e.1f4ff32c.2c0cba7c_boundary
